Class Zone

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Zone

  • public class Zone
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles a single zone.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Group 1 - DAT055 2014

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Get the x-coordinate of this zone.
        Returns:
        The x-coordinate

      • getY

        public int getY()
        Get the y-coordinate of this zone.
        Returns:
        The y-coordinate

      • isBombed

        public boolean isBombed()
        Check if this zone has been bombed.
        Returns:
        true if this zone has been bombed, false otherwise

      • setBomb

        public boolean setBomb()
        Bomb this zone.
        Returns:
        true if a ship was hit, false if it was a miss

      • hasShip

        public boolean hasShip()
        Check if this zone is occupied by a ship.
        Returns:
        true if a ship occupies this zone, false if this zone is free

      • getShip

        public Ship getShip()
        Get the ship occupying this zone.
        Returns:
        Ship or null if there is no ship

      • setShip

        public void setShip(Ship ship)
        Place a ship in this zone.
        Parameters:
        ship - The ship occupying the zone

      • setSunk

        public void setSunk()
        Sink the ship occupying this zone.

      • showShip

        public void showShip()
        Show the ship occupying this zone.

      • setClear

        public void setClear()
        Clear this zone in the GUI.
